project.description: JBoss Application Server 6.0 JBoss Application Server is an open-source Java EE-based application server. A Java EE certified platform for developing and deploying enterprise Java applications, Web applications, and Portals, JBoss Application Server provides the full range of Java EE 6 features as well as extended enterprise services including clustering, caching, and persistence. Homepage: http://www.jboss.org/
